body:
I'm actually starting to hit `out of memory` errors when running `karma`.

Considering test build times are around 2-4 minutes, I suggest we review the tests in this PR as-is, open another PR to investigate fixing/replacing karma entirely, and then come back to wrap the component tests after karma is settled.

@rehandalal @mythmon @Osmose Thoughts?

---

After some discussion, @Osmose pointed out that our karma tests are using prod builds, which is why builds take several minutes. Replacing `NODE_ENV=production karma start` with simply `karma start` cuts the build time by ~80%.
